components.name: crypto/sha256.New
components.description: Documented: Used to produce a checksum and validate cached files.

components.name: crypto/sha256.New
components.description: Documented: Used to validate cached installer files and inform the user if the installer is outdated.

components.name: crypto/rand.Int
components.description: Documented: Used to randomly select characters for passwords.

components.name: crypto/rand.Int
components.description: Documented: Used to select random characters for passwords.

components.name: crypto/rand.Int
components.description: Documented: Used to select random characters for passwords.

components.name: golang.org/x/crypto/bcrypt.GenerateFromPassword
components.description: Documented: Generate a hash of a randomly generated password.

components.name: golang.org/x/crypto/ssh.NewPublicKey
components.description: Documented: Used to save a newly generated ssh keypair to an authorized_keys file.

components.name: golang.org/x/crypto/ssh.MarshalAuthorizedKey
components.description: Documented: Used to save a newly generated ssh keypair to an authorized_keys file.

components.name: crypto/rsa.GenerateKey
components.description: Documented: Used to generate a random SSH private key

components.name: crypto/rand.Int
components.description: Documented: Used to generate a serial number for a self-signed certificate.

components.name: crypto/rand.Int
components.description: Documented: Used to generate a serial number for a signed certificate.

components.name: crypto/sha1.Sum
components.description: Documented: Used to generate a hash of an SSH public key.

components.name: golang.org/x/crypto/ssh/agent.NewClient
components.description: Documented: Used to establish SSH connections.

components.name: golang.org/x/crypto/ssh/agent.NewKeyring
components.description: Documented: Used to store keys in memory for SSH sessions.

components.name: golang.org/x/crypto/ssh.Dial
components.description: Documented: Used to create a new SSH client which can be used to SSH to address using user and the keys.

components.name: golang.org/x/crypto/ssh.PublicKeysCallback
components.description: Documented: Use a callback rather than PublicKeys

components.name: golang.org/x/crypto/ssh.InsecureIgnoreHostKey
components.description: Documented: Used to ignore insecure hosts.

components.name: golang.org/x/crypto/ssh/agent.ForwardToAgent
components.description: Documented: Used for routing authentication requests to the correct keyring.

components.name: golang.org/x/crypto/ssh/agent.RequestAgentForwarding
components.description: Documented: Used to setup agent forwarding for the SSH session.

components.name: golang.org/x/crypto/ssh.ParseRawPrivateKey
components.description: Documented: Used to parse private key data after reading it from a file on disk.

components.name: crypto/sha256.New
components.description: Documented: Used to hash files on disk for cache logic.

components.name: crypto/md5.Sum
components.description: Documented: Used to generate an ID for the Cloud Controller bashed on a hash of the infrastructure ID.

components.name: crypto/rand.Int
components.description: Documented: Used to generate a random number for the third octet of the network ID.

components.name: crypto/rand.Int
components.description: Documented: Used to generate a random number, which is used to get a random zone name for testing.

components.name: golang.org/x/crypto/ssh.ParseAuthorizedKey
components.description: Documented: Reads public SSH keys to perform additional validation that ensure the key is compliant with FIPS compatible key types.

components.name: golang.org/x/crypto/ssh.ParseAuthorizedKey
components.description: Documented: Helper function that relies on ssh.ParseAuthorizedKey() to validate the public SSH key, and returns an error if the key is invalid.

components.name: crypto/sha256.New
components.description: Documented: Used to hash the contents of corrupt .ovf files. The hash is used in error messages.
